title: Luxury 5 bedroom house with a beautiful landscape of 2 acres
details:
Mawanalla Ganethanna ,5 bedroom modern bungalow type house with all facilities surrounded by 2 acres with exquisitely beautiful landscape full of various natural flora for immediate sale.
1km from Colombo-Kandy road. Good for business purpose
For inquiries please call on +94 718306593 (Senanayaka)
price negotiable.
